dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT s.attribute2 bl_num, REPLACE(s.attribute1,'SCOULAR/NVO.','') po_no, loc1.location_name carrier_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') shipper_name, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'fmMM/DD/YY') system_date, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','3')) shipper_address, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','') shipper_city, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') shipper_state, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') shipper_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') consignee_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','3')) consignee_address, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','') consignee_city, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') consignee_state, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') consignee_zip, srem.remark_text additional_notes, (SELECT it.description FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN item it ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = it.item_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) descript_of_cargo, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT SUM(ROUND(ssunit.unit_net_weight_base,2)) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd JOIN s_ship_unit ssunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssunit.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1),'999,999,990.00')) || ' LB' total_weight, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fullname(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') manager_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') manager_phone, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') manager_fax, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') manager_company, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','3')) manager_address, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','') manager_city, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') manager_state, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') manager_zip FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem ON s.shipment_gid = srem.shipment_gid AND srem.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.ADDITIONAL NOTES' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON s.servprov_gid = loc1.location_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT DISTINCT NVL(s.attribute2, 'Data Missing in System') bl_num, NVL(REPLACE(s.attribute1,'SCOULAR/NVO.',''), 'Data Missing in System') po_no, NVL(loc1.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') carrier_name, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER'), 'Data Missing in System') shipper_name, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'fmMM/DD/YY') system_date, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','3')), 'Data Missing in System') shipper_address, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER',''), 'Data Missing in System') shipper_city, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER'), 'Data Missing in System') shipper_state, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER'), 'Data Missing in System') shipper_zip, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE'), 'Data Missing in System') consignee_name, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','3')), 'Data Missing in System') consignee_address, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE',''), 'Data Missing in System') consignee_city, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE'), 'Data Missing in System') consignee_state, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE'), 'Data Missing in System') consignee_zip, NVL(srem.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') additional_notes, NVL((SELECT it.description FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN item it ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = it.item_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1), 'Data Missing in System') descript_of_cargo, NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT SUM(ROUND(ssunit.unit_net_weight_base,2)) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd JOIN s_ship_unit ssunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssunit.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1),'999,999,990.00')), 'Data Missing in System') || ' LB' total_weight, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fullname(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER'), 'Data Missing in System') manager_name, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER'), 'Data Missing in System') manager_phone, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER'), 'Data Missing in System') manager_fax, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER'), 'Data Missing in System') manager_company, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','3')), 'Data Missing in System') manager_address, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER',''), 'Data Missing in System') manager_city, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER'), 'Data Missing in System') manager_state, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER'), 'Data Missing in System') manager_zip FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem ON s.shipment_gid = srem.shipment_gid AND srem.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.ADDITIONAL NOTES' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON s.servprov_gid = loc1.location_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT DISTINCT j.job_xid pro_no, j.attribute5 containers FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON ssul.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job j ON jorj.job_gid = j.job_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT DISTINCT NVL(j.job_xid, 'Data Missing in System') pro_no, NVL(j.attribute5, 'Data Missing in System') containers FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON ssul.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job j ON jorj.job_gid = j.job_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'
